content: Senior Social Media Editor, Lily Kartiganer rants about her gripe that the dragons in 'House of the Dragon' are not dragons, they are actually wyverns.
summary: Senior Social Media Editor, Lily Kartiganer rants about her gripe that the dragons in 'House of the Dragon' are not dragons, they are actually wyverns.
